title: 2007 Ford F-150 Truck

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Smog Certificate will be mailed within 1 week of pickup. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
